name: Mosher Island
description:
MOSHER ISLAND

Mosher Island is inspired by the ‘feeding the fire’ ceremony performed by the Dene of the Western Arctic.  The player awakens after a night of stories at an extinguished firepit on frozen Mosher Island. The player must learn to build a fire with twigs, sticks and logs. With the fire at a certain level, the player is able to venture out and explore the island to gather four offerings: Sage, Sweetgrass, Cedar and Tobacco, all while keeping the fire burning.
